allow: Bash(go env:*)
Bash(go build:*)
Bash(go test:*)
Bash(go tool cover:*)
Bash(git add:*)
Bash(git restore:*)
Bash(git commit:*)

Bash(git notes add -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Task: Update BuyModal for lot-based input
Track: lot_based_trading_20260210, Phase 3, Task 1

Summary: Added lot-based display and calculation to OrderModal \(BuyModal\).
The modal now shows the lot size multiplier, total shares, and estimated cost
in real-time as the user enters a lot quantity.

Files modified:
- ui/modal.go: Added lotSize, price, infoArea fields; SetLotSize, SetPrice,
  GetLotSize, GetTotalShares, GetEstimatedCost, updateInfo methods
- ui/modal_test.go: Added tests for lot size, calculation, info display
- ui/app.go: Updated OpenOrderModal/OpenOrderModalWithTicker to pass lot size
EOF
\)" b9021d9571480ba9d50dd31fb6d8628f0ba89a32)

Bash(Position: Y lots" info
- Update OpenCloseModal to use lot-based data when available

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "D:\\GolandProjects\\finamtrade\\finam-trade-test" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(models\): Add Name field to Position, Trade, and Order structs

Support human-readable instrument names across core data models.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Summary: Added Name string field to Position, Trade, and Order structs in models/models.go to support displaying human-readable instrument names instead of ticker symbols.

Files modified:
- models/models.go: Added Name field to Position, Trade, Order structs
- models/models_test.go: Added tests for Name field on all three structs
EOF
\)" 822edb2c3bb12a5fd7177aa240e601a1b0b68d2f)

Bash(git -C "D:\\GolandProjects\\finamtrade\\finam-trade-test" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''

EOF

Bash(git -C "D:\\GolandProjects\\finamtrade\\finam-trade-test" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
